about.title: About TutorConnect
about.missionText: To make quality education accessible to every student, regardless of location or language, through innovative tutoring solutions.
about.visionText: A world where every learner has access to personalized education and every educator can share their knowledge effectively.
about.valuesText: Excellence, accessibility, innovation, and community. We're committed to transforming education through technology and human connection.
about.storyText1: TutorConnect was founded with a simple yet powerful vision: to bridge the gap between students seeking knowledge and tutors sharing expertise. We believe that learning should be personalized, accessible, and transformative.
about.storyText2: Our platform brings together the convenience of modern technology with the personal touch of traditional tutoring. Whether it's door-to-door service for that personal connection or online sessions for ultimate flexibility, we've got you covered.
about.storyText3: We support multiple languages because we believe education should transcend language barriers. Our tutors are not just teachers; they're mentors who inspire and empower.
about.teamSubtitle: Passionate educators, technologists, and innovators working together to transform tutoring

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our tutoring services
faq.q1: How do I choose between door-to-door and online tutoring?
faq.a1: Consider your learning preferences, schedule flexibility, and location. Door-to-door offers personal interaction, while online provides more flexibility and access to global tutors.
faq.q2: What subjects and languages do you support?
faq.a2: We support all major academic subjects and three languages: English, Arabic, and Amharic. Our tutors cover everything from mathematics to language arts.
faq.q3: How are tutors verified and qualified?
faq.a3: All tutors undergo a rigorous verification process including background checks, qualification verification, and teaching demonstration assessments.
faq.q4: Can I switch between service types?
faq.a4: Yes, you can easily switch between door-to-door and online sessions based on your current needs and schedule.
faq.q5: What if I'm not satisfied with a tutoring session?
faq.a5: We offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with a session, we'll provide a free replacement session or full refund.
faq.a6: Payments are processed securely through our platform. You can pay per session or purchase packages for better rates. All major payment methods are accepted.
